short_summary: "AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME", FURNITURE, PUBLIC WORKS AND GOVERNMENT SERVICES: SUPPLY SUBORDER
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and notice posted on CanadaBuys, and all required supporting documentation and bid submission.  All bids submitted after will be declared non responsive  This NPP is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement to Provide Office Furniture Activities in response to Canada's budget 2019 commitment to provide sustainable low-carbon furniture for federal workplaces.
